definition: the act of subtracting (removing a part from the whole)
details:
noun
- the act of subtracting (removing a part from the whole)
= synonyms: subtraction
- the act of reducing the selling price of merchandise
= synonyms: discount
- reasoning from the general to the particular (or from cause to effect)
= synonyms: deductive reasoning, synthesis
- something that is inferred (deduced or entailed or implied)
= synonyms: entailment, implication
- an amount or percentage deducted
= synonyms: discount
- a reduction in the gross amount on which a tax is calculated
= synonyms: tax write-off, tax deduction
